dmca.title: SE Communications Ask Google to Purge Newsgroups (#2)
dmca.body:
SE COMMUNICATIONS LLC

May 5, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View. CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam (sent via Facsimile [private] and US mail)

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears under dates 
February 10, 2004 and March 1, 2004 on the site www.dirty-little-secrets.com. The text was published at groups.google.com on the above mentioned dates. The message ids are as follows: 
Message-ID: <20040210112233.21852.00001928@mb-m06.aol.com> 
Message-ID: <20040303174433.25108.00000533@mb-m07.aol.com>

2. The offending material appears within groups.google.com 
Message-ID: <677a3de6bf8c4bb02588c0fddb8633b9@news.teranews.com> 
Message-ID: <5681d55e7d921456aa0d5146fb6ce685@news.teranews.com>

3. I am the copyright owner and my contact information is [private], [private] or [private], [private]@[private].

4. The advertised number [private] is the information number for toll-free directories in the US And the whois information on the site, advertised www.phone-sex.com is bogus e.g., contact number is [private]. However, after further investigating it appears the owner of the website and individual responsible for this infraction and the one submitted on March 31, 2004 (8913471 (resolved 9688521)) may be reached at [private].

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
Chief Executive Manager

[private]
WASHINGTON, DC  20013

PHONE: [private]
